text: The Romen (; ) is a right tributary of the Sula with a length of 111 km and a drainage basin of 1,645 km². It begins in the northern Ukrainian Oblast of Chernihiv and flows into the Sula near the Sumy Oblast city of Romny. The average discharge quantity amounts to 3 m³/s at the delta. The name is of Baltic origin; cf. Lithuanian romus 'quiet'.E.M. Pospelov, Geograficheskie nazvaniya mira (Moscow, 1998), p. 355. ==References== Category:Rivers of Sumy Oblast Category:Rivers of Chernihiv Oblast
title: Romen (river)
